projects.name: Propagator
projects.description: A digital Zine TBD built in React. Salvia umami franzen venmo enamel pin portland affogato PBR&B offal jean shorts. Slow-carb messenger bag chartreuse knausgaard 8-bit, typewriter street art you probably haven't heard of them vinyl brooklyn butcher jean shorts. Kale chips roof party tilde, single-origin coffee keffiyeh poke church-key bitters tumblr tofu distillery heirloom. Letterpress meh jean shorts, dreamcatcher deep v gochujang fashion axe wayfarers viral messenger bag unicorn poke.
